\newcommand{\otte}{
\ottrulehead{e  ,\ p}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{x}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathbin{< >}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{refl} \, e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, x  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \widehat{x}  [  \sigma  ] }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{\_}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otteInline}{\ottprodinline{}{e  ,\ p}{\Coloneqq}{{x} \mid {\mathbin{< >}} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}}} \mid {\ottkw{refl} \, e} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, x  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid { \widehat{x}  [  \sigma  ] } \mid {\ottkw{\_}}}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{A  ,\ B  ,\ C  ,\ D}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, x  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{=}  e \, \ottkw{in} \, B}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottAInline}{\ottprodinline{}{A  ,\ B  ,\ C  ,\ D}{\Coloneqq}{{ 1 } \mid { \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B } \mid { \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  B } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A } \mid {\ottkw{let} \, x  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{=}  e \, \ottkw{in} \, B}}}

\newcommand{\ottce}{
\ottrulehead{cE  ,\ cP}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\bullet}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{refl} \, cE}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  cP  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  cE_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  cA  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  cB  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  cE  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  cE_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottceInline}{\ottprodinline{}{cE  ,\ cP}{\Coloneqq}{{\bullet} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  cE} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  cE} \mid {cE_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {\ottkw{refl} \, cE} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  cP  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  cE_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  cA  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  cB  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  cE  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  cE_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}}

\newcommand{\ottcA}{
\ottrulehead{cA  ,\ cB}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : cA  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  cB }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \underline{x} : cA  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  cB }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ cE_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  cA }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottcAInline}{\ottprodinline{}{cA  ,\ cB}{\Coloneqq}{{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : cA  . \,  B } \mid { \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  cB } \mid { \forall  \underline{x} : cA  . \,  B } \mid { \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  cB } \mid { cE_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  cE_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  cA }}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvVarName}[0]{ConvConvVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvVarLabel}[0]{ConvConvVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \equiv  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvVarName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvVarLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAVarName}[0]{ConvConvAVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAVarLabel}[0]{ConvConvAVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\sigma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  \sigma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash   \widehat{x}  [  \sigma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  ]   \equiv   \widehat{x}  [  \sigma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  ] }{%
{\ottdruleConvConvAVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvAVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvAVarName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvAVarLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvUnitName}[0]{ConvConvUnit}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvUnitLabel}[0]{ConvConvUnit}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvUnit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \mathbin{< >}  \equiv  \mathbin{< >}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvUnitName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvUnitLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvUnit{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvUnitName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvUnitLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvLamName}[0]{ConvConvLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvLamLabel}[0]{ConvConvLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  A_{{\mathrm{2}}} \quad \Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvLamName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvLamLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvLam{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvLamName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvLamLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPLamName}[0]{ConvConvPLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPLamLabel}[0]{ConvConvPLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{Γ;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  A_{{\mathrm{2}}} \quad \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  \lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvPLamName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPLamLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvPLam{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvPLamName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvPLamLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAppName}[0]{ConvConvApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAppLabel}[0]{ConvConvApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \quad \Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  p_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  p_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, p_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, p_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvAppName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvAppLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPAppName}[0]{ConvConvPApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPAppLabel}[0]{ConvConvPApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \quad \Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  p_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  p_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  p_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\{}  p_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvPAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvPAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvPApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvPAppName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvPAppLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvReflName}[0]{ConvConvRefl}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvReflLabel}[0]{ConvConvRefl}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvRefl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{refl} \, e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  \ottkw{refl} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdruleConvConvReflName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleConvConvReflLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleConvConvRefl{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleConvConvReflName}{#1\ottdruleConvConvReflLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdefnHeaderConvConv}[0]{$\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \equiv  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}$}

\newcommand{\ottdefnConvConv}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{\ottdefnHeaderConvConv}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvAVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvUnit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvPLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvPApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleConvConvRefl{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\end{ottdefnblock}}

}{

%% defn Neut
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutVarName}[0]{RedNeutVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutVarLabel}[0]{RedNeutVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{neutral}}{%
{\ottdruleRedNeutVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedNeutVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedNeutVarName}{#1\ottdruleRedNeutVarLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutAppName}[0]{RedNeutApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutAppLabel}[0]{RedNeutApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{neutral} \quad e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{neutral}}{%
{\ottdruleRedNeutAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedNeutApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedNeutAppName}{#1\ottdruleRedNeutAppLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutPAppName}[0]{RedNeutPApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutPAppLabel}[0]{RedNeutPApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutPApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{neutral} \quad e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{neutral}}{%
{\ottdruleRedNeutPAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutPAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedNeutPApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedNeutPAppName}{#1\ottdruleRedNeutPAppLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutSubstName}[0]{RedNeutSubst}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutSubstLabel}[0]{RedNeutSubst}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutSubst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{p \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{neutral} \quad e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  A  \ottsym{,}  B  \ottsym{,}  e \, \ottkw{are} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{neutral}}{%
{\ottdruleRedNeutSubstName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNeutSubstLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedNeutSubst{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedNeutSubstName}{#1\ottdruleRedNeutSubstLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdefnHeaderRedNeut}[0]{$e \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{neutral}$}

\newcommand{\ottdefnRedNeut}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{\ottdefnHeaderRedNeut}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedNeutVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedNeutApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedNeutPApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedNeutSubst{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnRedNeutLabeled}[2][]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#2]{\ottdefnHeaderRedNeut}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedNeutVarLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedNeutAppLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedNeutPAppLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedNeutSubstLabeled[#1]{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

}{

}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormLamName}[0]{RedNormLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormLamLabel}[0]{RedNormLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal} \quad e \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}{%
{\ottdruleRedNormLamName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormLamLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedNormLam{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedNormLamName}{#1\ottdruleRedNormLamLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormPLamName}[0]{RedNormPLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormPLamLabel}[0]{RedNormPLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormPLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal} \quad e \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
\lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}{%
{\ottdruleRedNormPLamName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormPLamLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedNormPLam{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedNormPLamName}{#1\ottdruleRedNormPLamLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormReflName}[0]{RedNormRefl}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormReflLabel}[0]{RedNormRefl}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormRefl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{e \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
\ottkw{refl} \, e \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}{%
{\ottdruleRedNormReflName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormReflLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedNormRefl{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedNormReflName}{#1\ottdruleRedNormReflLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormUnitName}[0]{RedNormUnit}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormUnitLabel}[0]{RedNormUnit}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormUnit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\mathbin{< >} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}{%
{\ottdruleRedNormUnitName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedNormUnitLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedNormUnit{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedNormUnitName}{#1\ottdruleRedNormUnitLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdefnHeaderRedNorm}[0]{$e \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}$}

\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormUnitLabel}[0]{RedTNormUnit}

}{
 1  \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}{%

}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormUnitLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedTNormUnit{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedTNormUnitName}{#1\ottdruleRedTNormUnitLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormPiName}[0]{RedTNormPi}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormPiLabel}[0]{RedTNormPi}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormPi}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal} \quad B \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
 \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B  \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}{%
{\ottdruleRedTNormPiName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormPiLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedTNormPi{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedTNormPiName}{#1\ottdruleRedTNormPiLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormForallName}[0]{RedTNormForall}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormForallLabel}[0]{RedTNormForall}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormForall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal} \quad B \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
 \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  B  \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}{%
{\ottdruleRedTNormForallName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormForallLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedTNormForall{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedTNormForallName}{#1\ottdruleRedTNormForallLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormEqName}[0]{RedTNormEq}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormEqLabel}[0]{RedTNormEq}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormEq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal} \quad e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal} \quad e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}%
}{
 e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A  \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}}{%
{\ottdruleRedTNormEqName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedTNormEqLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleRedTNormEq{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleRedTNormEqName}{#1\ottdruleRedTNormEqLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdefnHeaderRedTNorm}[0]{$A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{normal}$}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedTNormUnit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedTNormPi{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedTNormForall{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedTNormEq{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn OK
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKVarName}[0]{OkOKVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKVarLabel}[0]{OkOKVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{x  \in  V}%
}{
V  \vdash  x \, \ottkw{OK}}{%
{\ottdruleOkOKVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleOkOKVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleOkOKVarName}{#1\ottdruleOkOKVarLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKMVarLabel}[0]{OkOKMVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKMVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
V  \vdash   \widehat{x}  [  \sigma  ]  \, \ottkw{OK}}{%
{\ottdruleOkOKMVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKMVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleOkOKMVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleOkOKMVarName}{#1\ottdruleOkOKMVarLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKUnitName}[0]{OkOKUnit}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKUnitLabel}[0]{OkOKUnit}

}{
V  \vdash  \mathbin{< >} \, \ottkw{OK}}{%

}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKUnitLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleOkOKUnit{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleOkOKUnitName}{#1\ottdruleOkOKUnitLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKLamName}[0]{OkOKLam}

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \vdash  e \, \ottkw{OK}}%
}{
V  \vdash  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e \, \ottkw{OK}}{%
{\ottdruleOkOKLamName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKLamLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleOkOKLam{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleOkOKLamName}{#1\ottdruleOkOKLamLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKPLamName}[0]{OkOKPLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKPLamLabel}[0]{OkOKPLam}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKPLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \underline{x}  \vdash  e \, \ottkw{OK} \quad \underline{x}  \in  \ottkw{fv} \, e}%
}{
V  \vdash  \lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e \, \ottkw{OK}}{%
{\ottdruleOkOKPLamName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKPLamLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleOkOKPLam{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleOkOKPLamName}{#1\ottdruleOkOKPLamLabel}

\ottpremise{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{are} \, \ottkw{ground} \quad V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK}}%

\ottpremise{V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad \ottsym{(}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}%

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppOKName}[0]{OkOKAppOK}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppOKLabel}[0]{OkOKAppOK}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppOK}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  \lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  \ottsym{[}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{ground} \quad V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK}}%
}{
V  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK}}{%

}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppOKLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleOkOKAppOK{#2}%

}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppNeutName}[0]{OkOKAppNeut}

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppNeut}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{ground} \quad V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{NeuINERT}}%
}{
V  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK}}{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppSafeName}[0]{OkOKAppSafe}

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKAppSafe}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  \lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{OK} \quad A \, \ottkw{is} \, \ottkw{ground} \quad V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{OK}}%
}{
V  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \lambda^{\forall}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{OK}}{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKSubstGroundName}[0]{OkOKSubstGround}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKSubstGroundLabel}[0]{OkOKSubstGround}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKSubstGround}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  p  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{,}  A \, \ottkw{OK} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \vdash  B \, \ottkw{OK} \quad e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  p  \ottsym{,}  A  \ottsym{,}  B \, \ottkw{are} \, \ottkw{ground}}%
}{
V  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{OK}}{%
{\ottdruleOkOKSubstGroundName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKSubstGroundLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleOkOKSubstGround{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleOkOKSubstGroundName}{#1\ottdruleOkOKSubstGroundLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKSubstInertName}[0]{OkOKSubstInert}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKSubstInertLabel}[0]{OkOKSubstInert}
\newcommand{\ottdruleOkOKSubstInert}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
V  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{OK}}{%
{\ottdruleOkOKSubstInertName}{}%
}}

  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleOkOKSubstInertName}{#1\ottdruleOkOKSubstInertLabel}
}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFPApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFPAppU{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFRefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFSubst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFLet{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFAVar{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnWfWFLabeled}[2][]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#2]{\ottdefnHeaderWfWF}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFVarLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFUnitLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFLamLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFPLamLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFAppLabeled[#1]{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFAVarLabeled[#1]{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn TWF
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitTName}[0]{WfTWFUnitT}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitTLabel}[0]{WfTWFUnitT}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitT}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash   1 }{%
{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitTName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitTLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitT{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitTName}{#1\ottdruleWfTWFUnitTLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFPiName}[0]{WfTWFPi}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFPiLabel}[0]{WfTWFPi}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFPi}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  A \quad \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  B}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash   \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B }{%
{\ottdruleWfTWFPiName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFPiLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfTWFPi{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfTWFPiName}{#1\ottdruleWfTWFPiLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFForallName}[0]{WfTWFForall}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFForallLabel}[0]{WfTWFForall}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFForall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  A \quad \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \underline{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  B}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash   \forall  \underline{x} : A  . \,  B }{%
{\ottdruleWfTWFForallName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFForallLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfTWFForall{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfTWFForallName}{#1\ottdruleWfTWFForallLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFEqName}[0]{WfTWFEq}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFEqLabel}[0]{WfTWFEq}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFEq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  A \quad \Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \quad \Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash   e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{%
{\ottdruleWfTWFEqName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFEqLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfTWFEq{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfTWFEqName}{#1\ottdruleWfTWFEqLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdefnHeaderWfTWF}[0]{$\Gamma  \mathbin{;}  M\Gamma  \vdash  A$}

\newcommand{\ottdefnWfTWF}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{\ottdefnHeaderWfTWF}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitT{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFPi{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFForall{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFEq{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnWfTWFLabeled}[2][]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#2]{\ottdefnHeaderWfTWF}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitTLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFPiLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFForallLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFEqLabeled[#1]{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
